name: Amazon Security Lake
mapping: Amazon Security Lake Default Mappings Beta
description: This plugin supports ingestion of Alerts (DLP, Malware, Policy, Compromised Credential, Malsite, Quarantine, Remediation, Security Assessment, Watchlist, UBA, CTEP, Device, and Content), Events (Page, Application, Audit, Infrastructure, Network, Incident, Endpoint and Client Status) and WebTx logs. The data will be ingested in the Amazon Security Lake Custom Source bucket. This plugin does not support ingestion of data in raw JSON format.

configuration.label: Authentication Method
configuration.description: Select the method to be used for AWS client authentication.
